Package tud.iir.helper

Class Summary
CollectionHelper This class adds some methods that make it easier to handle collections.
DateHelper This class helps to transform and help with dates.
DBStore This class allows one to save data into a database instead of keeping it in memory.
FileHelper The FileHelper helps with file concerning tasks.
LineAction  
Logger Deprecated. DON'T USE THIS ANYMORE The Logger is responsible for logging messages.
LoggerMessage The LoggerMessage is a message that is sent from the Logger to its observers.
MathHelper The MathHelper adds mathematical functionality.
StringHelper The StringHelper adds string functionality.
StringInputStream  
StringOutputStream  
ThreadHelper  
TreeNode A simple tree implementation.
WordNet  
XPathHelper A helper to handle xPath.
